meanings.definition: The emission of light from a substance as a result of heating.
meanings.sent1: Thermoluminescence is when a material glows after being warmed up.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thermoluminescence to understand how materials give off light when heated.
meanings.sent3: The thermoluminescence of the rock made it look like a tiny star in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like thermoluminescence in the night.
meanings.sent5: The thermoluminescence of the fireflies in the garden was a magical sight.

meanings.definition: The process of measuring the light emitted from a substance when it is heated.
meanings.sent1: Researchers use thermoluminescence to measure how much light comes from heated objects.
meanings.sent2: Thermoluminescence helps scientists determine the amount of light given off by different materials when heated.
meanings.sent3: The thermoluminescence experiment turned the lab into a glowing wonderland.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity was like thermoluminescence, always shining bright in the pursuit of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the thermoluminescence measurement left everyone in awe of the scientific process.
